full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement #6371

#### Tender Details
*   **Title (English):** TBIPS – Stream #1: Application Services – A.1: Program/Software Architect – Program/Software Developer Stream #3: Information Management/Information Technology Services
*   **Title (French):** TBIPS - Volet #1 : Services d'application - A.1 : Architecte de programme/logiciel - Développeur de programme/logiciel - Volet #3 Gestion de l'information/technologie de l'information
*   **Reference Number (English):** cb-6371-51534220
*   **Amendment Number (English):** 2
*   **Solicitation Number (English):** NRCan-5000073982
*   **Publication Date (English):** June 12, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date (English):** June 26, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM
*   **Amendment Date (English):** June 26, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date (English):** N/A
*   **Expected Contract End Date (English):** N/A

#### Procurement Information

*   **Notice Type (English):** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method (English):** Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contracting Entity:** Natural Resources Canada
*   **Contact Information:** Bianca Moore, bianca.moore@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca, 613-323-0520

The tender package includes two files:
